Description: On I-264 at mile marker 1.2 in the City of Portsmouth, near Greenwood Drive, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On VA-28 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Willard Rd; Rt. 8457W (Fairfax County); Rt. 6215W (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
